scripts.js: babel jquery.custom-select.js --out-dir dist --source-maps && uglifyjs dist/jquery.custom-select.js --compress --source-map "content=dist/jquery.custom-select.js.map,includeSources,url=jquery.custom-select.min.js.map" --output dist/jquery.custom-select.min.js
scripts.sass: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true jquery.custom-select.scss dist/jquery.custom-select.css && node-sass --output-style compressed --source-map true --source-map-contents true jquery.custom-select.scss dist/jquery.custom-select.min.css
